TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerTransaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class DesignerTransaction Implements IDisposable
public ref class DesignerTransaction abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一种方法来对一系列的设计时操作进行分组，从而提高性能并能撤销大多数类型的更改。

span.span: Provides a way to group a series of design-time actions to improve performance and enable most types of changes to be undone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务可以跟踪稍后可撤消的操作。Transactions can track actions that can be undone later. 可以通过取消事务来撤消事务中所做的更改，这会通过将每个已更改的属性设置为其预更改值来自动尝试反转每个更改。Changes made during a transaction can be reversed by canceling a transaction, which automatically attempts to reverse each change by setting each changed property to its pre-change value. 事务还可以在执行一系列操作期间提高性能，方法是将对显示的更新推迟到事务完成。Transactions can also improve performance during a series of operations by deferring updates to the display until the completion of the transaction. 当事务正在进行时，某些组件会在事务完成之前，通过侦听和事件来延迟其 处理 。When a transaction is in progress, some components defer their processing until the transaction has completed by listening to the and events. 例如，在事务关闭之前，属性窗口不会更新其显示。The Properties window, for example, does not update its display after a transaction has opened until the transaction has closed. 若要将事务用于可逆或多个操作，请让设计器 为应可逆的每个操作或一系列操作创建一个。To use transactions for reversible or multiple operations, have your designer create a for each operation or series of operations which should be reversible. 请注意，不要在可能阻止撤消事件序列成功完成的事务之外执行操作。Be careful not to perform actions outside the transactions that might prevent a sequence of undo events from completing successfully. 可以通过调用的方法来获取新的 。You can obtain a new by calling the method of an . 务必从活动获取每个 ，以便 与设计器事务处理机制正确集成，而不是直接创建新的 。Be sure to obtain each from the active in order to correctly integrate with the designer transaction processing mechanism, rather than creating a new directly. 若要在事务中执行操作，必须首先创建一个事务。To perform an action within a transaction, you must first create a transaction. 然后，必须在 每次更改或发生一组更改之前调用方法，并在 每次更改或发生更改后调用方法。Then you must call the method before each change or set of changes occurs, and the method after each change or set of changes occur. 最后，通过调用方法完成并关闭事务 。Finally, complete and close the transaction by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 更改属性值时，请使用的 方法，该方法 调用的组件更改方法 并创建 表示自动更改的。When making changes to property values, use the method of a , which calls the component change methods of the and creates a representing the change automatically. 若要执行事务，请完成以下步骤：To perform a transaction, complete the following steps: 1. 调用 以获取 可用于控制事务的。Call to obtain a that can be used to control the transaction. 2. 在 `try` 块中，对于要使用跟踪的每个操作 ，调用 方法，进行更改或更改，然后调用 方法以指示已进行了更改或更改。Within a `try` block, for each action that you want to track with a , call the method, make the change or changes, then call the method to signal that the change or changes have been made. 3. 若要完成事务，请 从块中调用 `finally` 。To complete the transaction, call from within a `finally` block. 在 c # 中，可以使用 `using` 语句而不是 `try/finally` 块，如以下示例中所示。In C#, you can use the `using` statement rather than a `try/finally` block, such as in the following example. ``` using (host.CreateTransaction() { // Insert your code here. } ``` 若要在提交事务之前取消并尝试回滚事务，请调用 方法。To cancel and attempt to roll back a transaction before it has been committed, call the method. 调用方法时，将反转跟踪的操作， 尝试回滚更改。When the method is invoked, the actions tracked by the are reversed to attempt to roll back the changes. 若要撤消作为先前事务的一部分发生的操作，必须使用开发环境提供的 "撤消" 命令。To undo actions that occurred as part of earlier transactions, you must use the undo command provided by the development environment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例程序演示如何 从设计器创建。The following code example program demonstrates how to create a from a designer. 若要运行此示例，请将源代码编译到类库中。To run this sample, compile the source code into a class library. 必须添加对 System.web 程序集的引用。You must add a reference to the System.Design assembly. 在新项目中，添加对已编译的 DLL 的引用，然后将库中的组件添加到 " **工具箱**"。In a new project, add a reference to the compiled DLL and add the component in the library to the **Toolbox**. Visual Studio 中提供了此功能的广泛支持。There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio. 另请参阅 [演练：用自定义组件自动填充工具箱](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx). 设计器可以选择显示有关设计器事务事件的通知。The designer can optionally display notifications about designer transaction events. 如果在设计模式下将的实例添加 `DTComponent` 到窗体，则会出现一个消息框，询问你是否想要接收设计器事务事件通知。If you add an instance of the `DTComponent` to a form while in design mode, a message box appears asking whether you would like to receive designer transaction event notifications. 您可以使用右键单击实例时显示的快捷菜单来切换这些通知 `DTComponent` 。You may toggle these notifications using the shortcut menu that appears when you right-click an instance of the `DTComponent`. 当使用属性窗口更改值时，将创建事务。Transactions are created when you change values using the Properties window. 您还可以让设计器通过单击组件快捷菜单上的 " **执行示例事务** " 来执行事务。You can also have the designer perform a transaction by clicking **Perform Example Transaction** on the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消事务并尝试回滚由事务的事件作出的更改。

span.span: Cancels the transaction and attempts to roll back the changes made by the events of the transaction.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已取消事务。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the transaction was canceled.

value.span: 如果事务已取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the transaction was canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当取消设计器事务时，事务处理机制将尝试回滚在事务中迄今为止已进行的更改。When a designer transaction is canceled, the transaction processing mechanism attempts to roll back the changes that have been made so far in the transaction. 此操作是否成功依赖于每个操作的类型这类因素，其他操作是否干扰就任何所涉及的代码的状态，以及是否无法完成预期的操作序列。Whether this succeeds is dependent upon such factors as the type of each operation, whether other operations interfered with any of the involved code's state, and whether a sequence of expected operations failed to complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

span.span: Commits this transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提交设计器事务时，该事务将被视为已完成，并且不会跟踪进一步的更改。When a designer transaction is committed, the transaction is considered complete and does not track further changes. 提交事务后，进一步调用此方法不会执行任何操作。Once a transaction has been committed, further calls to this method do nothing. 创建事务后始终调用此方法，以确保事务正常关闭。Always call this method after creating a transaction to ensure that the transaction closes properly.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Committed As Boolean
public: property bool Committed { bool get(); };

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose Method
Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与此对象关联的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with this object.

summary.span: 如果此事务尚未提交，则此重写方法将提交此事务。

span.span: This override commits this transaction if it was not already committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 通过调用重写并清理资源 `Dispose(false)` 。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法; `Finalize` 在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的方法，除非已通过调用方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止 。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCancel() cil managed

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当取消设计器事务时，事务处理机制将尝试回滚在事务中迄今为止已进行的更改。When a designer transaction is canceled, the transaction processing mechanism attempts to roll back the changes that have been made so far in the transaction. 此操作是否成功依赖于每个操作的类型这类因素，其他操作是否干扰就任何所涉及的代码的状态，以及是否无法完成预期的操作序列。Whether this succeeds is dependent upon such factors as the type of each operation, whether other operations interfered with any of the involved code's state, and whether a sequence of expected operations failed to complete.

para.span: 当在派生类中实现时，此方法取消事务。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, this method cancels a transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCommit() cil managed

summary.span: 执行提交事务的实际工作。

span.span: Performs the actual work of committing a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提交设计器事务时，该事务将被视为已完成，并且不会跟踪进一步的更改。When a designer transaction is committed, the transaction is considered complete and does not track further changes.

para.span: 在派生类中实现时，此方法执行与处理事务关联的工作。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, this method performs work associated with processing the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed
abstract member System.IDisposable.Dispose : unit -> unit override this.System.IDisposable.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事务时，将提交事务。When a transaction is disposed, it is committed.
